text: As more seniors get their second dose of the #COVID19 #vaccine, they are eager to see loved ones and hug their grandchildren again. #UTSW geriatric specialists Namirah Jamshed and Molly Camp offer guidance for this crucial turning point. Entire episode: https://t.co/Zd0FK4dBhX https://t.co/SSAhL3kX6K
